issue.title: [CF 1074] Resource over time Icon
issue.body:
A resource loss/gain over time icon/condition would be really nice. E.g. if X resource lost within Z amout of time icon will appear. Would be really useful for telling for instance the extent of dmg your takeing at this moment; to show dmg reducing buffs only when necessary.


> Posted by CurseForge user shisagi | Imported from CurseForge issue #1074 | Raw

comments.body:
That is something that you should be deciding for yourself based on your current combat situation, and not something that addons should be deciding for you based on arbitrary conditions.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
